alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 2:03PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Winds up to 55 mph will impact portions of central Blaine, Lincoln, western Cassia and Minidoka Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 200 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms extending from near Shoshone to the Utah Idaho border near Trout Creek Mountain, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and mesonet observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Shoshone, Oakley Reservoir, Paul, Oakley, Richfield, Dietrich, Shoshone Ice Caves, Kimama, Laidlaw Corrals Airport and Bostetter Ranger Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Wood River Foothills
